description: A former student of Washu (revealed in spin-off media as a creation of hers). In the pursuit of science he frequently pillages ruins for relics with no regard to life or property, earning him the nickname `Ruins Buster` and status of Eternally Wanted by the Galaxy Police. Kagato makes an attempt to recover Ryouko (whom he previously brainwashed into serving him) and use the power of her gems to capture Tsunami.
name: Kagato
